item.title: Trying out Eager Execution
item.description: So there was a Data Science competition and after a long long time, I was doing something in Deep Learning. I was looking at colab when I saw this term “Eager Execution” popping up. So there I was trying to figure out what it was. Here in this article I try to summarise what I learnt from various sources. What it is? It’s a new imperative. The pythonic way of using tensorflow.
